lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning put on a show for the ages Sunday, rallying the Colts from 18 points down and driving them 80 yards for the winning score in a victory over the Patriots in the A.F.C championship.
snippet: Peyton Manning put on a show for the ages Sunday, rallying the Colts from 18 points down and driving them 80 yards for the winning score in a victory over the Patriots in the A.F.C championship.
